website_summaries.verdict: Probably the best-tasting protein powder on the market right now.
pros: Pure ingredients make it blend easily, and it tastes incredible without any added carbs or sugars
Filtration process reduces fat, lactose and impurities without using harsh acids or salt
Take it before or after workouts to promote muscle recovery
cons: A bit expensive, but you are paying for pure, high-quality ingredients

customer_reviews.title: A true classic!
customer_reviews.text: Nitro-Tech was the first whey protein to get me in the supplement game. After many years with tremendous results, I decided to switch things up a bit when I saw this product. I am quite glad I did so. The strawberry flavor is amazing and doesn't leave you with that "whey aftertaste." Anyone who drinks shakes on the regular knows what I'm talking about. I can feel an obvious difference between days that I drink this post-workout and days that I don't. Great taste, great results, I found my new go-to
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Muscles immediately swell and become engorged
customer_reviews.text: I love nitro tech gold powder. I drink two shakes a day and when I go to work out my muscles immediately become swoll and engorged. I've never had a powder that really delivers awesome and immediate results after the first shake. This product does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bice

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and only 2 carbs per serving
customer_reviews.text: I started protein a couple days ago. I like the double rich chocolate taste. It is my second favorite flavor since I switched to muscle tech products. I like that it doesn’t mess with my stomach and mixes well. It is nice that the protein has 5.5g of BCAA’s in each serving. Also there is only 2g of carbs.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Flores

customer_reviews.title: Best Tasting MuscleTech Whey SO FAR!
customer_reviews.text: This is, so far, my favorite Muscle Tech Whey. The cookies and cream flavor is, by far, the most subtle and best tasting and the whey it's self is a fine powder easy for blending, but I have also been using a shaker and it handles within about 30 seconds. I typically use skim milk when mixing. The price point is on par and truly this is the best i've had so far. I can see results already.
customer_reviews.author: Evan F.

customer_reviews.title: Real Whey Protein
customer_reviews.text: I always check the quality of my protein pouring boiling water on top of the protein. If your protein coagulates and make something like a lumps it means that is a real protein. Many fake whey proteins don’t make lumps and just dissolves completely like a milk powder. I’ve got this 5.5lb of Muscletech for an amazing price so I decided to test it same day to make sure it’s not fake. I can tell that’s a real protein. Good quality. Good price. Good deal! Photo attached!
customer_reviews.author: Vissentis

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, blends well
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying the Whey Gold from NitroTech. So far I'm enjoying this protein powder, given the value at its affordable price. I ordered the Strawberry flavor. At first, it took me a few days to get used to the taste. But after awhile, the artificial flavor resides and the drink tastes like strawberry milk. I used 8 oz. of unsweetend vanilla almond milk and that's perfect for me. If you don't blend enough milk with the powder, it ends up tasting very sugary. So adjust the milk ratio to your liking. I don't recommend mixing this with water, it's gross in my opinion. I also like blending frozen strawberries in, you can make a berry shake!
customer_reviews.author: Kiley

customer_reviews.title: Great Protein!
customer_reviews.text: Of all the protein’s I have used over the years this is by far one of the best tasting I have ever had. Along with the great flavor is the easiest mixing as well. Muscletech proves once again why they are the industry’s go to for the best supplements. This will be my new staple for on the go protein as it delivers a great balance of required protein and with the bonus of all the required BCAA’s. I feel confidant taking this on a regular basis knowing all the science that back’s their great products. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: Cookies and cream overrated
customer_reviews.text: I don't find cookies and cream tasty. I've tried a lot of different protein powders, and this is in the lowest quartile for taste. I also don't like the consistency. It's a bit thick and makes me slightly bloated. I'm giving it a 5 star for value because I bought a 2.2 pound tub for $13.91. I've never bought protein at that price before. But I'm not thrilled about having to finish the rest of this tub. I'm starting to prefer cheap ready to drink protein like Equate walmart brand. Those are about $15 for a dozen, convenient and tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Discreet User

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: The product mixes well and tastes great. What more could you want? The calories (120) are lower than in most powders and the sugar (2 gms) is also lower than most powders. I use the Cookies and Cream flavor and love it. It doesn't leave an aftertaste - and it mixes well with hot/warm beverages as well as the traditional cold beverages.
customer_reviews.author: B. RogersTop Contributor: Historical Fiction Books

customer_reviews.title: 2 Pound for a few weeks now and LOVE it. NO grainy aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: Been using the MuscleTech NitroTech Whey Gold, 100% Whey Protein Powder, Whey Isolate and Whey Peptides, Double Rich Chocolate, 2.2 Pound for a few weeks now and LOVE it. NO grainy aftertaste, full rich chocolate flavor, no bloated feeling. This protein taste great and works wonderfully! I can't recommend it any higher - if they had 6 stars I've give it to this protein!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Denning

customer_reviews.title: Nasty
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand the good reviews. Has a very chemically taste, with an aftertaste that’s even worse and the aftertaste lasts for a good hour. Even the smell once mixed smells like chemicals. I bought the vanilla, but it’s so bad I won’t be giving any other flavors a chance. Can’t wait until I use it all and it’s gone from my life forever. Just nasty.
customer_reviews.author: Old Goat Ninja

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting Effective Protein
customer_reviews.text: This protein is great tasting and mixes well. I have seen and felt amazing results when consuming this. I take it as directed, pre and post workout and in between meals. It definitely works and I would highly recommend this MuscleTech and every MuscleTech product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Taste is horrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible flavor. For a muscletech product, very very low quality. Taste so artificial that it cannot be good for you. Please redo your flavors. I’d pass on this product
customer_reviews.author: DCTCCT

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with this stuff! I wish it was cheaper, but I guess the quality is better. I am picky with protein powder because certain ones can mess with my stomach and this one hasn’t at all! So I would definitely recommend it! I have tried vanilla and it was great!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob G.

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Not terrible, but I did not care for the taste. Had this on subscribe and save, so I consumed a decent amount of it. I thought I could force feed it to myself until I learned to like it, but the taste just never got better for me. It honestly makes it harder to drink. Mixes alright and made every bottle smell terrible, even if I washed it immediately after use. Never could get ahead of the smell with this protein.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan McBride

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad tasting
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure whether it works well yet as I started it today , but I guess the taste is just ok. It's not too strong tasting, more like a strawberry shake as I used vanilla almond milk, it's not as bad tasting as some I have had and it blends pretty well , I guess time will tell to how it works . I'm not sure they sure as to whether will buy it again , will see
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Tastes fine but ingredient quality could be better
customer_reviews.text: Looked this up on a third party purity and safety testing lab website for suppliments after the fact. I used to buy whatever was on sale. I can afford +$10/month for better stuff in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: No chocolate taste to chocolate flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in chocolate flavor. Cannot taste any chocolate at all. I will have to add cocoa powder to finish this container. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: NanaDana

customer_reviews.title: Relieves muscle pain + good taste
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Double Rich Chocolate which tastes very good. The main reason I bought it is to help with muscle cramps when I do some "hardcore workout" (sudden snow shoveling or lifting 20 lb dumbbells). The pain's gone within hours of drinking it.
customer_reviews.author: Carousel

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder was huge when I bought it, I use it 1-2 times per day and is still lasting me even though I bought it months back, the flavor can be intense so I tend to use either a banana or peanut butter to counteract the sweetness of the vanilla. I also noticed I recover faster with this protein compared to other brands
customer_reviews.author: Tanvir Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great and seems effective.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for about a week and a half. Perhaps it is a placebo effect, but I do notice I recover quicker from running and lifting days. I've never used supplements before, but I'm happy with this one. It is made in the USA, from a reputable company and is easy to use. I like that it says there are no banned substances in it. I just mix it up with 6 ounces of chilled tap water in one of those GNC shake mixer/tumbler sippy things. Tastes like chocolate milk to me, so I love it and is a nice treat after a run or workout!
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Not to be dramatic but drinking this is the worst part of my day
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why the reviews are so high. I got “cookies and cream” (does not taste like that), and I seriously hate the taste. Using a blender bottle without the metal whisk, it left me with lots of clumps every time, even when I tried shaking it with a small amount of liquid, letting it settle, then adding more liquid. Once I found the metal part for my blender bottle, it mixed okay. So taste and mixability aside... it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Faye Kagan

customer_reviews.title: My tub taste horrible
customer_reviews.text: Taste like a drink that a cigarette has been sitting in. How can you put award winning flavor ? My Amazon account has many protein purchases and this had led me to leave a review. 3 star for kindness and product purpose & ingredients. I purchased chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler W

customer_reviews.title: Flavor and Mixability
customer_reviews.text: With the Muscle Tech 2lb Protein, you can never go wrong. This product (no matter the flavor) always mixes well. If I was rating just the product it's self and not the flavor, it would be a five star every time. I was not a big fan of this flavor when compared to the cookies and cream or the double rich chocolate. Overall, MuscleTech always has the best of products. They have yet to dissatisfy me and are always shipped earlier than expected. This kind of customer care and service sets very high standards for other companies.
customer_reviews.author: CyFlick

customer_reviews.title: Taste is good
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste. It is sweet despite containing so little amount of sugar. I workout at least 5 days a week and have this drink after every workout. I gained 17 lbs within 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Romero

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting protein at an affordable cost
customer_reviews.text: This is a BIG container of protein with 77 servings. I did calculations on just about all whey proteins on Amazon to find the protein that delivers the most grams of protein per dollar spent. This protein won with 45.5 grams of protein per dollar spent (even more with amazon 5% cashback). This protein tastes delicious too and doesn't have the chalky protein taste to it.
customer_reviews.author: cambridge hampsher

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor with some flaws
customer_reviews.text: It has a great taste but when you take it make sure you get ready because you might feel tired or have a an angry stomach so if it is your first time just try it before fully buying this because it may different effects on everyone else’s stomach
customer_reviews.author: Frank c

customer_reviews.title: Best for fruit smoothies. Mixes well.
customer_reviews.text: Mixed pretty good with water and taste isn't bad at all either. My best mixture results have come from using 2% milk and diluting with a little water. I don't like it with skim milk. All water or slightly mixed. Goes great with fruit smoothies though! Perfect mixture comes from 1 banana (half OK), one 1.5 cups of frozen fruit, 1 cup of water, and half cup of milk. Makes a 0.75L smoothie if you do it right.
customer_reviews.author: jwalker

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like tainted grated cheese
customer_reviews.text: Taste hideous!!! Milk chocolatey vibe but imma dark choc guy. I will not be buying again. Good profile but its powdered chocolate fish scales.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: The Flavor is not good
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product multiple times and never had an issue, but for some reason the one I just bought leaves the most disgusting after taste in my mouth. I bought 5 lbs of it and honestly want to just throw it away, I can barely get this down even with chugging it and mixing it with a variety of other things. I would not recommend the vanilla flavor. Hopefully, it is just a weird batch that I got.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Delicious protein shake
customer_reviews.text: Great value, high quality, great tasting protein supplement from a consistent, reliable and trusted company - MuscleTech. Perfect after weight training. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle M. Back

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but tastes horrible
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because it was a good deal price per serving. Well, I've tried a lot of protein powders in my life and this one, unfortunately, is in my top 3 of worst tasting. Don't get me wrong, sometimes you just suck it up and drink it but I couldn't stomach this one.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Quality & Efficient
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product. You can tell it's high quality by its clean taste and nutrients. I appreciate the pure protein you get with no added fillers or anything unnecessary, helping me hit my macro goals and stay within calorie limits. The taste is good too. Not bland like other vanillas but makes a great base for smoothies and shakes.
customer_reviews.author: OS

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate web description not good
customer_reviews.text: This item would be good if the web description was correct it says that there is 77 servings and it's worng there are 31 servings per container now I have to send it back because of this wrong Information. I'm not happy right now
customer_reviews.author: Marina Sias

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: My favorite muscletech protein.French vanilla flavor is a winner.Great balance of protein with bcaa's.
customer_reviews.author: Drushee

customer_reviews.title: cookies 'n' cream = love
customer_reviews.text: delicious. put in blender with peanut butter, flax seed, ice cubes, and milk. delicious. nice nutritional values. not excessive fat or carb. new favorite. get it!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great protein at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! Great price per serving, and a great macro nutrient breakdown. For the price it's the best available in my opinion. The taste is good (standard decent chocolate protein flavor) and it mixes super well.
customer_reviews.author: Austin R.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: If a protein drink really tasted like a milkshake, I would give it 5 stars for taste. This isn't that good, but it does taste good to me. It is a little hard to get into solution in cold liquid, but if you let it sit a while after mixing it in, and then stir it up again, it smooths out.
customer_reviews.author: C. Renfro

customer_reviews.title: Taste is chalky AF
customer_reviews.text: not sure if im getting the perks from the protein. I have and try many brands and flavors. Strawberry is one of the worst in this brand
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Good macro profile
customer_reviews.text: Good macro profile, good consistency & mixability, provided nice volume in a pancake. Only bad thing I would say is the flavor has an odd butter quality, almost like when you put too much vanilla extract in something.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Miller

customer_reviews.title: Milk or vitamin juice
customer_reviews.text: Delicious flavor delicious texture only thing I would say was that I had a mixture of whole milk and vitamin juice instead of just straight waterWhich really helped with the flavor
customer_reviews.author: ryan clack

customer_reviews.title: Strawberry (Nasty)
customer_reviews.text: Strawberry is a nasty flavor! Will never be getting this flavor again. It makes my gag or sometimes it wants to come back up. Very fake flavor. But I have tried the churro flavor, that one is way better.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Blaze

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to venture out and try the French Vanilla Creme instead of a typical Chocolate or Vanilla flavor. I was very impressed with how it tasted! Muscletech is always my go to for Protein mainly for the taste. Excellent product and unique flavor
customer_reviews.author: Oliver S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used Muscle Tech for a year now, and it is a great product to add to my daily workout program.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great Whey Protien
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the chocolate flavor. It tasted pretty good and mixed very well with a shaker cup. You can't beat 24g of protein, 5.5g of BCAA's, and 4g of glutamine! I would recommend and would purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: One bottle came with broken seal
customer_reviews.text: One bottle came with broken seal.It's attached to the bottle with transparent tape.But it's already broken.What's the purpose of this?
customer_reviews.author: AnAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate laxative...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the vanilla flavor. No stomach issues there. But the chocolate made my stomach turn inside out. Constant trips to the restroom. It was like taking a laxative. Not happy with the chocolate, have to throw out almost a full tub worth.
customer_reviews.author: PublicName

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor, generous portion
customer_reviews.text: Good flavor. Blend with ice and a little coconut milk in my Ninja Blender and makes a great smoothie without no powder taste. Blend and put in popsicle trays for a cold snack as well.
customer_reviews.author: Christie David

customer_reviews.title: Tastes bad French Vanilla Creme
customer_reviews.text: French Vanilla creme does not taste good . Great value for cost .
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great whey
customer_reviews.text: Great product- wish they had more flavors. This is my go-to whey. Great tasting and great results!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great protein shake
customer_reviews.text: This a great protein shake. Taste good and mixes well very smooth and not lumpy. Give you everything you need from a post workout shake and a ton of protein. Since I've been using whey gold I have notice an increase in size and strength. I would recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian C

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to write a review after making a shake with added bcaa unflavored. For the amount of carbs per serving(2g), the taste is incredibly great! It masks that nasty flavor of bcaa! Can’t say the same about vanilla flavor, if you add unflavored bcaa Powder to that shake it becomes disgusting!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Not bad great low carb protein powder and tastes pretty good will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Aesthetic Jones

customer_reviews.title: Taste is good enough, value can't be beat
customer_reviews.text: The taste was good enough. The price can't be beat. It's the most grams of protein per dollar of any protein powder I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Weird Taste But Good Value
customer_reviews.text: The cookies and cream flavor is cloying and sweet like fake maple syrup. Doesn't mix well and clumps up in the shaker bottle. But overall good value considering the amount you get. It's not the worst powder I've had -- and I've had many -- but I would prefer not to have to choke this down.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Rule

customer_reviews.title: Protein powder cookies and cream is very good. It doesn't leave me feeling bloated
customer_reviews.text: Protein powder cookies and cream is very good. It doesn't leave me feeling bloated, tastes great and mixes really well with skim milk (some clumps). I am still working on getting into a better workout plan. I hope to use this to tone muscle, after I lose more weight. It is a good meal replacement for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but not with water
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product so far. I feel it has all the best components for a protein powder with a good price point. I tried this with water. Absolutely...DISGUSTING. That’s the reason for the 4 stars. It made me feel sick to my stomach. I didn’t feel “right” for like 2 days. However, when I paired it with chocolate oat milk it tasted great ! The oat milk gave it a more chocolatey taste.
customer_reviews.author: Cypriana Okuzu

customer_reviews.title: Hard on the stomach
customer_reviews.text: Something about the composition won't let me take the recommended serving. More than 1 scoop in a day destroys by stomach, so this has significantly hindered my protein intake. For reference, my normal protein is Pro Gainer which is much heavier. Flavor is good, consistency is good.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste FINALLY something that taste great
customer_reviews.text: Taste great and ive tried a lot This is and will be my survival and go to product
customer_reviews.author: Vuorinen

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Muscletech did a great job with this product I was and still am very happy with how it tastes and the amount of protein that I am able to easily supplement with it! It’s perfect for when I need a quick was to up my protein intake for the day!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie luna

customer_reviews.title: Great product all around
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Flavor is good. Mixes very well. And a very good price for the product as well
customer_reviews.author: RyanElizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Strawberry Tastes soo bad
customer_reviews.text: OMG this stuff has the worst flavor and after taste. Horrible
customer_reviews.author: Chris Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mix but strawberry flavor is meh.
customer_reviews.text: Strawberry flavor isn’t that great. It is very easy to mix though and it does not upset my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Best value on Quality Protei!
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was a super buy! 5.5 lbs. Can't go wrong with Muscle Tech. 77 servings, less than .60 cents per serving! How awesome! Mixes easy, Strawberry flavor tastes good! My wife says there is an artificial sweetener taste to it! She is so picky!
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: High quality, Great Flavor
customer_reviews.text: The protein mixes extremely well. The flavor is great and was better than expected. The macros of this product are great for those looking to add protein to their diet without too much of a caloric hit.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Loved this
customer_reviews.text: I loved this stuff would order again, taste was a little off kinda like fish food but for the quality of ingredients you cant beat it
customer_reviews.author: Tit ma’get

customer_reviews.title: Great product, so-so strawberry flavour.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, no bloating, easy to digest but the strawberry flavour isn't great. I bought strawberry as it was a few dollars cheaper at the time, but will pay the extra for the chocolate in the future.
customer_reviews.author: david williams

customer_reviews.title: Taste Great, and mixes well!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff taste really good, I have to watch my six year old cause he will drink it if you sit it down, lol. Mixes well with just a normal shaker cup. Arrived as promised. Me and my family love Amazon. Will be ordering something else soon!!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great Protein, Good Taste!
customer_reviews.text: I use 2 scoops (48 gr of protein) to recovery after a hard workout and to build muscle and strength. Tastes pretty good, but also provides great recovery and results. Also this is is the most cost-effective high-quality protein I have found! This is now the only brand of protein powder I order
customer_reviews.author: Weight Loser/Muscle Gainer

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the $
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good, mixes good enough (4/5) and is a great price. Doesn’t upset my stomach at all. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: taste and effectiveness results
customer_reviews.text: This protein is great, its taste amazing and provide excellent results 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Rita Gomez

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE the Cookies and Cream Flavor!
customer_reviews.text: It's honestly hard to believe how good Cookies and Cream tastes. It's one of the best flavors out there. The only concern/worry I have is how the price of the 2.2lbs drops down to below $14 which is very odd while everything else is more than $25.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: French Vanilla = Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I had the strawberry flavor and thought it was pretty good. However, I recently received a massive container of the French Vanilla and it may be the worst tasting protein powder I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Huddleston

customer_reviews.title: I'd love to have it sfain
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful protein. Flavor, protein amount per service and overall package m
customer_reviews.author: Steban H.

customer_reviews.title: Mixes well and taste great
customer_reviews.text: Really good taste and mixes well! I got the cookies and cream one
customer_reviews.author: Akachi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality & macros content!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It's not clumpy, and it's thin enough to use in oatmeal, pancakes, shakes or mixed with peanut butter! I love that it's low both in sugar & carbs. It makes it a definite go-to for show/prep or cutting! Its definitely reasonably priced for its quality as well!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C

customer_reviews.title: Great mix, better build!
customer_reviews.text: Overall this product is great! Been using it this flavor for little over three weeks, it mixes well, I don’t feel bloated after drinking it, and flavor is good, but Dulce de Leche still remains my favorite flavor. Been drinking this product for two months and since, I have seen an increase in strenght; lifting heavier and doing more sets. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: JVaz518

customer_reviews.title: Great results, Taste not so much!
customer_reviews.text: Some results! The taste is not the greatest but it will do the trick if you put in the work!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A. Alejandre

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Nitro Tech is a great product.. mixes well, taste great and is affordable. I have been adding MT Creactor (unflavored) to my post work out shake and like the results. I have tried many proteins and this one is tops.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pricing
customer_reviews.text: It’s bigger than I thought, My hubby is excited to try it!
customer_reviews.author: Cinthia Calvillo

customer_reviews.title: Great Recovery Protein
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I am new to the weightlifting scene. I just started lifting April of 2018 and found out that I needed a great recovery shake to compliment my hard work in the gym. With 24g of protein, 5.5g of BCAA's, and 4g of Glutamine and Precursor this product gives me what I need to hit the gym hard again tomorrow. The French Vanilla Creme is a very tasty flavor.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyTheViking

customer_reviews.title: Taste Great
customer_reviews.text: This is one of if not the best protein powders I've had. The taste is great. I've only mixed it with water. Can't imagine how good it is with milk.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B

customer_reviews.title: MuscleTech Brand...You can't go wrong IMO.
customer_reviews.text: A go to supplement brand for me when I need a top quality and inexpensive protein. I trust the brand just as I do Optimum Nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri Illya Jeet

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad product, but underwhelming flavor and mix
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product, but underwhelming flavor and mix. The flavor is ok (not great) and it tends to mix a little chunky versus higher quality competitor product. For a cost conscious alternative its a fine product, but there are better ones out there (Optimum Nutrition Gold Whey - Chocolate flavor for example).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can use with milk or water
customer_reviews.text: I got the double rich chocolate protein. This is my first time trying this brand. I would give it 5 stars but honestly I'm just not a fan of the flavor I got. It tastes like fudgesicles, which I hate, but if you like, get this flavor! It mixes SUPER well in water or almond milk. Looking forward to trying more flavors!
customer_reviews.author: Aen37

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Nutritious
customer_reviews.text: Very delicious and muscle building. I enjoyed this protein powder with milk, it was delicious and i definitely felt like my muscles were getting the protien they needed
customer_reviews.author: audrey casce

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! Ordered the strawberry flavor. Low in carbs and mixes very well with my shaker cup using almond or cashew milk. No lumpy protein leftovers. Excellent value as well.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Cant go wrong with muscletech
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. Mixes very well taste is next to none. I use it as a appetite suppressant works very well. My wife doesn't like protein drinks but loves this. Will be getting again and probably a double order for the wife.
customer_reviews.author: michael boone

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great Whey protein with excellent flavor. I use this almost immediately after my workout. Occasionally i'll use this protein as a meal supplement but not too often as I am also trying eat cleaner. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jaypown

customer_reviews.title: One of the worst in terms of mix ability
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many Muscletech products before including Nitrotech but this one wasn't up to the standard you would expect. One of the worst in terms of mix ability. Won't blend completely even with a shaker bottle or blender. Taste is not bad but I've had better tasting ones.
customer_reviews.author: CamaroRider

customer_reviews.title: Tastes bad
customer_reviews.text: Dident mix properly and the flavor was not so good
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Protein but if you read the back label eight claims that it can’t contain soy
customer_reviews.text: This product is a Whey Protein but if you read the back label eight claims that it can’t contain soy
customer_reviews.author: Shandi Cravens

customer_reviews.title: Love IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how MuscleTech does it....but they have the best products! Can't beat their strawberry flavor! Use a magic bullet with ice/banana for the best homemade protein shake.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Septon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: Just started weight-lifting and this product works perfectly. The "cookies and creams" flavor tastes good, like milk shake. Recommend it if you plan to go work out in the gym!
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT tasting product using only water
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT tasting product using only water! It mixes easy with just a shaker cup (no clumping). There is 24g of Protein per serving and 5.5g of BCAAs. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taste us not that good
customer_reviews.text: The taste is not as good as others. Too bad I bought such a large container!
customer_reviews.author: Diane C. Lytwyn

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes u can buy it with only 13 bucks !
customer_reviews.text: Great taste , great price , bought twice and going to buy more of these !
customer_reviews.author: Aram Manvelyan

customer_reviews.title: Best Tasting out there
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite Whey protein. I like the added BCAAs and the taste is best on the market - no chalkiness or weird after taste.
customer_reviews.author: George C. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting protein that mixes easily, with the vanilla make sure not to put too much water when mixing because it does mess with the flavor quite a bit. Does taste like a french vanilla latte though!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Archambo

customer_reviews.title: GOOD STUFF
customer_reviews.text: I realy like this protein, has bccas and alot if protien and low calories. The only thing is the strawberry flavor isn't real strong when mixed with water, but i mixed it with some almond milk and it tastes amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Gilberto

product_meta.title: MuscleTech Nitro-Tech Whey Gold Protein Powder, Whey Isolate and Peptides, 24 Grams Protein, 5.5 Grams BCAAs, Easy to Mix, Tastes Great, Gluten-Free, Double Rich Chocolate, 2.2 Pounds (31 Servings)
product_meta.description:
NITRO-TECH 100% WHEY GOLD is a superior 100% whey protein powder designed for men and women looking to improve recovery, build lean muscle, improve strength and enhance performance. NITRO-TECH 100% WHEY GOLD from MuscleTech contains pure whey protein isolate and peptides as the primary protein source. Every scoop provides 24 grams of ultra-pure whey protein, 5.5 grams of Branched Chain Amino Acids (BCAAs) and 4g of glutamine and peptides. What’s more, it’s great-tasting flavors don’t pack the extra sugar and carbs you’ll see in other whey protein powders. Plus, for a limited time, you 10% more protein for free! Try the bonus size today!

EASY MIXING:

Mix 1 scoop with 5 oz. of cold water or skim milk in a glass or shaker cup. Use between major meals and before and after exercise. Read the entire label before use and follow directions provided

STACKING GUIDE:

NITRO-TECH 100% WHEY GOLD provides the building blocks for lean muscle and recovery. It stacks well with MuscleTech Platinum 100% Creatine, MuscleTech AminoBuild Next Gen, MuscleTech VaporX5 Next Gen and Clear Muscle.
feature_bullets: FROM AMERICA'S #1 SELLING SUPPLEMENT COMPANY – Nitro-Tech Whey Gold delivers 24g of premium 100% whey protein, 5.5g of BCAAs, and 4g of glutamine with 130 calories, 2.5g fat, 2g carbs
TASTES GREAT and MIXES EASILY – Mix with cold water or skim milk in a glass or shaker cup

PROMOTES LEAN MUSCLE and RAPID RECOVERY – Whey peptides promote rapid recovery from exercise and support an insulinogenic response for improved nutrient delivery for men and women. Builds lean muscle, increases strength and enhances performance

ABSORBS FAST and DIGESTS EASY – Whey peptides are an ultra-pure, rapidly absorbed and quickly digested whey protein powder that allows you to recover faster, build more lean muscle and get better results from your training sessions
USE BETWEEN MEALS or BEFORE or AFTER EXERCISE – Use anytime of the day. Stacks with MuscleTech Platinum 100% Creatine, MuscleTech AminoBuild Next Gen, MuscleTech VaporX5 Next Gen and Clear Muscle

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
